oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Forrest cavalry corps medal badge
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Medal badge with the following wording: General R[obert]. E. Lee, Member, Forrest Cavalry Corps, General N[athan]. B[edford]. Forrest. This badge was given to members of the National Organization of the Forrest veterans and their descendants. This organization is still in existence.
